happiness_dialog_cheated_on_0: Why does this always happen to me..?
happiness_dialog_cheated_on_2: What did I do to deserve this?
happiness_dialog_cheated_on_3: Where did it all go wrong?
happiness_dialog_breakup_0: I wish it didn't have to end..
happiness_dialog_breakup_1: At least I wasn't cheated on..
happiness_dialog_breakup_3: I'm sorry that we ended up this way.
happiness_true_self: I discovered a new part of my orientation!
happiness_dialog_true_self_0: It feels so good to realize myself.
happiness_dialog_true_self_1: My orientation is the biggest part of what makes me, me.
happiness_dialog_true_self_2: I'm going to own myself and I won't hide it!
happiness_dialog_true_self_3: I wouldn't have it any other way.
ForceLover Description: Force a unit to become lovers with another unit
trait_aromantic_info: They do not desire love unlike most
trait_aromantic_info_2: It's not because they have not found the right person, they just feel this way
trait_homoromantic_info: They would like to only romantically be involved with the same sex
trait_homoromantic_info_2: I love people who are like me!
trait_heteroromantic_info: They would like to only romantically be involved with the different sex
trait_biromantic_info_2: Pulls sexes without needing to fuck any of them. What's your excuse?
trait_asexual_info: They do not desire sex unlike most
trait_asexual_info_2: Sex is so weird. It's soggy and time consuming.
trait_heterosexual_info: They prefer having sex with the opposite sex
trait_homosexual_info: They prefer having sex with the same sex
trait_homosexual_info_2: It ain't a choice, that much can be told.
trait_bisexual_info: They love having sex with both sexes
trait_faithful_info: They will never cheat on someone even if their romantic preference no longer matches their partner's sex
trait_faithful_info_2: It's the right thing to do.
trait_unfaithful_info: They will never commit to their relationship
trait_abroromantic_info: Their romantic orientation may change over time
trait_abroromantic_info_2: It'll be hard to commit to a lover.
trait_abrosexual_info: Their sexual orientation may change over time
culture_trait_homophobic_info: They despise others who get romantically or sexually involved with the same sex as themselves
culture_trait_heterophobic_info: They despise others who get romantically or sexually involved with a different sex from themselves
culture_trait_heterophobic_info_2: It's strange to think of two different sex people getting together.
culture_trait_incest_info: Biologically related members may fall in love and have sex
culture_trait_orientationless_info: The idea of orientations do not exist. They will only find lovers that they can breed with.
culture_trait_orientationless_info_2: What's a sexuality or romantic orientation? That's witchcraft thinking!
culture_trait_committed_info: They are commited to relationships and will never cheat no matter how bad things get.
culture_trait_mature_dating_info: They will only date those that are in the same age stage as them.
culture_trait_mature_dating_info_2: No more 18 year olds dating 90 year olds!
subspecies_trait_preservation_info: If their relative population count to their max limits are low, they will try to find lovers that they can reproduce with no matter what, disregarding what their culture or orientation may deem appropriate.
subspecies_trait_preservation_info_2: When the going gets tough, you do what you must to keep your legacies.
AllowCrossSpeciesLove Description: Whether different subspecies should be able to love each other.
MustBeSmart Description: Whether the two subspecies involved have to have all their brain functions in order to love each other.
MustBeXenophile Description: Whether the initiating lover has to be xenophile in order to love another subspecies unlike them. The receiving lover does NOT need to be xenophile, but they cannot be xenophobic.
